title: Sprint 09: Testing, DevOps & Quality
description: Ensuring stability, automated testing, and professional deployment standards.
items: 01- Test Driven Development: The Red-Green-Refactor cycle concept and benefits
02- PHPUnit Configuration: xml settings, env vars, test suites, coverage reports
03- Feature Testing: HTTP assertions, actingAs user, session state, JSON testing
04- Unit Testing: Testing isolated classes, services, logic without app boot
05- Mocking: Mockery, spy(), shouldReceive(), partial mocks, construction injection
06- Facade Mocking: Storage::fake(), Bus::fake(), Event::fake(), Http::fake()
07- Static Analysis: PHPStan/Larastan configuration, levels, typing coverage
08- CI/CD Pipelines: GitHub Actions steps (test -> build -> deploy), caching deps
09- Docker Environment: Dockerfile, docker-compose for dev vs prod (Sail vs Custom)
10- Linux Fundamentals: Permissions, Nginx config, PHP-FPM pool config, Systemd
11- Deployment Strategies: Blue/Green, Rolling updates, Maintenance mode
12- Zero Downtime: Atomic deployments, symlink swapping, deploy scripts
13- Server Provisioning: Basic VPS setup, firewall (UFW), SSH keys management
14- Coding Standards: Laravel Pint, ECS, Git hooks (Husky) for formatting
15- Code Review: Reviewer checklist, automated PR comments, conventional commits
